title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 9003.9 - Restriction on glass
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 9003.9 - Restriction on glass

State Regulations

ParksCorp may, in its discretion, designate certain parks, or
portions thereof, as restricted areas wherein no glass bottles or other glass
containers will be permitted. This section shall not apply to glass bottles or
containers used in the care and feeding of infant children. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
9003.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
